items.name: Vengeance LPX 16GB (2×8) DDR4-3200
items.paragraph: Built for high performance, the Vengeance LPX DDR4 delivers fast and stable speeds for gaming and multitasking. Its low-profile aluminum heatspreader ensures cool and reliable operation even under heavy loads.

items.name: Dominator Platinum RGB DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: This premium DDR5 memory combines cutting-edge performance with vibrant RGB lighting. It’s designed for enthusiasts who want both top-tier speed and a striking look inside their PC.

items.name: Trident Z RGB 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Known for its bold RGB design and high-speed performance, the Trident Z RGB DDR4 offers smooth multitasking and gaming. It’s ideal for users who want both beauty and power in one kit.

items.name: Trident Z5 RGB 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Featuring lightning-fast DDR5 technology and sleek aesthetics, the Trident Z5 RGB ensures ultra-responsive performance. It’s built for next-gen systems that demand maximum speed and efficiency.

items.name: FURY Beast DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: The FURY Beast DDR4 offers a great balance of performance and price. With reliable speeds and easy plug-and-play setup, it’s perfect for gaming or everyday computing upgrades.

items.name: FURY Renegade DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Designed for high-end gaming PCs, the FURY Renegade DDR5 delivers blazing-fast 6000 MT/s speeds. It also features dynamic RGB lighting and full XMP 3.0 support for optimal tuning.

items.name: DDR5-5200 UDIMM (CT32G52C42U5)
items.paragraph: Crucial’s DDR5 memory offers improved bandwidth and efficiency for modern CPUs. It’s non-RGB, making it a reliable and straightforward choice for professional and workstation builds.

items.name: T-FORCE Delta RGB DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.specs: 3200 MT/s, CL16, RGB lightbar, aluminum heatspreader
items.paragraph: The T-FORCE Delta RGB stands out with its striking lightbar design and dependable DDR4 speed. Perfect for gamers who want style without compromising stability.

items.name: T-FORCE XTREEM ARGB DDR4 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: Built for serious performance, this memory kit provides low latency and bright ARGB effects. It’s a premium choice for overclockers and performance enthusiasts.

items.name: OEM DDR5 32GB Module
items.paragraph: This OEM-grade DDR5 module delivers consistent and efficient performance. It’s ideal for system builders and professionals who need JEDEC-standard reliability.

items.name: XPG SPECTRIX D60G DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: The SPECTRIX D60G offers unique RGB coverage and solid DDR4 speed for gaming PCs. It’s both stylish and reliable, designed for users who like bold aesthetics.

items.name: XLR8 Gaming DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: PNY’s XLR8 Gaming memory provides stable 3200 MT/s performance and a gamer-inspired design. It’s a cost-effective upgrade for gaming desktops.

items.name: Viper Steel DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: This kit offers high performance with durable aluminum heatspreaders. The Viper Steel is built for gamers who value strength, speed, and reliability.

items.name: Hades RGB DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: With sleek RGB lighting and dependable speed, the Hades RGB is a great pick for style-conscious gamers. It balances aesthetics with consistent performance.

items.name: DDR4-3200 (CT16G4DFD832A)
items.paragraph: A simple and stable DDR4 module that provides dependable speed for office or home PCs. Perfect for users who prefer non-RGB, plug-and-play upgrades.

items.name: EVO X II DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: The EVO X II brings together RGB customization and solid 3200 MT/s performance. It’s a reliable choice for gamers seeking visual flair and speed.

items.name: FURY DDR4 16GB (2×8)
items.paragraph: Offering excellent performance with XMP support, the HyperX FURY DDR4 is built for smooth gaming and multitasking. Its plug-and-play design makes upgrading effortless.

items.name: Viper Venom DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: This DDR5 kit combines high speed and low latency with stunning RGB effects. It’s perfect for high-performance gaming and creative workflows.

items.name: LANCER RGB DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: The XPG LANCER RGB delivers exceptional speed and visual appeal. It’s optimized for DDR5 platforms, ensuring top performance in demanding tasks.

items.name: Vengeance DDR5 32GB (2×16)
items.paragraph: The Corsair Vengeance DDR5 offers fast and stable performance with a clean, minimalist design. It’s a reliable choice for builders looking for power without the RGB.
